website_summaries.verdict: Decent range, multiple channels, and an affordable price make this option worth considering for those wanting an intercom system without spending a lot of money.
pros: Wireless, so the components of this system are ready to use right out of the box
Delivers a range of up to 1/2 mile and operates on 7 channels
cons: Mixed opinions on the clarity of the sound quality
Talk button can be quirky, as it occasionally sticks

customer_reviews.title: Stop Screaming Please....!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I own a large two story home. We've lived here for many years, yelling and screaming through the floors. "Honey, could you please heat up the rest of the coffee and bring it up to me?!!" "Babe, if you're not going to eat the steamed veggies I made, could you please put them away for me!!!??" Day in and day out, turning off air conditioners, muting T.V.S. and screaming at the top of our lungs through the floors, to communicate but no more...!!!! Now with our new intercoms, all we have to do is press the call button and speak into our intercoms. Eazy peazey....! The best decision we've ever made.....!1!!!
customer_reviews.author: Murray Kreloff

customer_reviews.title: Works in metal pole barn
customer_reviews.text: We needed to be able to communicate from house and older garage to our new garage with metal inside and out and heavily insulated. Our cell phones did not work in this new fortress. Now we have an intercom in all 3 locations and it works quite well. Pretty easy to set up and use. We are happy with these intercoms !
customer_reviews.author: L R

customer_reviews.title: Great expandable system
customer_reviews.text: They work well, you can program each one and only call and speak to that specific one instead of the whole group, though that is an option too. My only small grip is you can only do that for up to 6 machines, I could use a couple more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Trishalana B. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: A Purchase Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item from Hosmart through Amazon Online without any problems whatsoever. The intercoms were easy and quick to set up right out of the shipping containers. We would not hesitate to recommend these to others without hesitation. We are completely satisfied with these items for use in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Have had this set long enough for a fair review, and they work great. Live in a townhouse so are using them between floors with no problems. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey m cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item for communicating room to to room.
customer_reviews.text: I set up the intercom system in three rooms, 2 on the first level and the third on the second floor. All three intercom work well, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: This is great and service was great
customer_reviews.text: I sent to the company itself for this intercom. The price was great and their service was excellent! I couldn’t get the monitor to stay on. I emailed them. Heard from them immediately. Problem was fixed. Works perfectly! I’m very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This intercom is plug and play easy. The sound quality is great and works well in any room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents like it, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for grandparents who are 85+, they had a family friend come set the system up (3 units). they use 1 button that is a push to talk ll they use it for is kitchen to garage or 1 room to another. Granpa is hard of hearing and it seems to work for them if one person is yelling into the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: homeinak

customer_reviews.title: 200 feet away and no problem
customer_reviews.text: Three of us are using these intercoms, living on same property. They work perfectly, just follow instructions easy to set up. I haven't understood the battery part so all of us are just plugging it in and using it. The item works good, well made, I would definitely recommend this intercom, so far no static. We received the item much earlier than expected. We all absolutely love it. Hopefully, a year or two from now I can say the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Country

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to give my mother an alternative to yelling across the house she is older and has a brain injury so learning is sometimes difficult for her but she learned how to use this and when she thinks about it she uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: good walkie talkie
customer_reviews.text: works as a walkie talkie, picks up all the neighbor kids games However, this great company is replacing my units for ones that will function as advertised. Good Folks to deal with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Carl

customer_reviews.title: No more screaming in my house!!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was very easy as all units come with channel 1 programmed, so it's basically pluy and play! I have a unit in the basment, one in the main level, and one in my bedroom upstairs. Communication is very clear and I have no static issues. option to chargr via USB or wall outlet is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used these for long, but so far they work as advertised. The appear to be well made for the price point. I would like to see a battery back up model, so the unit can be moved around. We have a big property and carrying one (or a hand held model) around would be handy.
customer_reviews.author: SJMars

customer_reviews.title: They work great! My disabled husband can track me down all ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great! My disabled husband can track me down all over the house now. :) I can even hear the call button out in the garden!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to just press a button to communicate with my husband out in his workshop and man cave! Easy to set up and has good voice clarity!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work at all Well
customer_reviews.text: I contributed a negative review shortly after I bought this product: interference on many of the frequencies, no communication at all between floors of my house. The company offered to replace the products if I removed the bad review. I did, they sent the replacements. The replacements worked no better than the originals. This product may be fine in an open area in the country, but in the city, and in a multi-floor house, they are almost totally useless. They're now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: RickW

customer_reviews.title: No way......
customer_reviews.text: No way the positive reviews are real. The sound quality is terrible. Overall quality with fit and finish is terrible. Volume is too low. Very cheap toy-like quality in general. Way over priced for what you get, again. This is more like a kids toy. Avoid this. Don’t buy. Mine went back.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: No more shouting around the house!
customer_reviews.text: My older Husband and I live in a 3 story chalet. He doesn't hear well and when I'm upstairs and he's down, I have to stand at the top of the stairs and SHOUT if I need him, telephone call, etc. Not always hearing me, I have to run downstairs and it gets very frustrating. This system has been a blessing. It sends a loud beep 3 times to alert an incoming "call" and he responds very well with the equipment. Best thing I ever bought for this house!
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not so good for the price. It sounded promising once we got them set up. One of the units stopped working all together after a couple weeks. The "talk" option is super quiet and the ringing option is sooo loud. Returned items after a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: AGreene

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for using in our home.....one upstairs and one downstairs. So far they are working great!! The other one will go out in our garage once it's warmer out, so we'll see then if distance affects them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as promised.  Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews. But this product was worthless. Intensely loud call ringer. Really low talk volume. Setup instructions were literally wrong. Called their help. Great guy tried to help. He realized the instructions are wrong (based on a new version, NOT the one in the box). But even after helping, the talk volume was way too soft, And the ringer volume is not adjustable ( as the instructions say it is). Returned for full refund today. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: The ringer is very very loud
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to set up but my only complaint is that the ringer is so very loud even on its lowest setting. These would be a great in a warehouse or industrial environment. But not in a house/guest house setting. When ringing the other side I feel like I am damaging their hearing. Like I already said the lowest setting is overly loud especially in a quiet house. Otherwise its a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great intercoms that we use daily
customer_reviews.text: This keeps us from yelling for the kids because they can't hear us or we can't find them! We have one on every floor and use them several times a day. With that being said, the only negative is that the power cords are kind of flimsy and one tip broke off within a few months. Another was bent and close to breaking. The company is great to work with though and provided a hassle free replacement for both. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works from our house to our Barn with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Set up is incredibly easy. The only thing I found somewhat confusing is switching channels for different locations. Mine keep switching back to channel one after a few minutes so you have to remember which location you want to call. Easy, but something to remember or tell people if they are going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ghosttrooper

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  Not worth a penny
customer_reviews.text: Worst sound quality. We have one upstairs and on in the finished basement and you can barely make out what is coming through the speaker. These are crap quality. I spent extra for a third reciever for the garage. It wont transmit that far. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Juju2335

customer_reviews.title: Volume adjustment issues...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there are a few flaws with this system. The ringer is LOUD and there is no way to adjust the volume. I bought these for my salon, and the ring is outrageously obnoxious. The other problem is that I can't get the volume to adjust loud enough to be able to hear one another. As you adjust the volume, it doesn't even change enough to notice a difference. Unfortunately, this will be another dust collector for me... however, if you don't have a situation where you need to adjust the volume, these may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Tichenor

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: These units are awful. they work if you hold them close to you mouth and ears. like walkie talkies. But as far as an intercom, they just barely do what you need. it does call me with call button, but sound clarity is bad and ability to talk without getting very close to mic is useless, you pretty much have to get you mouth on unit for them to work correctly
customer_reviews.author: Doorgunner1969

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: My three units need rebooting regularly otherwise someone calling from one unit to another won't make/receive contact. Perhaps it's just poor radio connection/transmission??? Can't count on them working as advertised without relentlessly rebooting each unit daily...dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great....sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had for long. My wife loves it as she no longer has to yell at me from another room.. Need to put it trough some more paces but so far does exactly what I wanted... Had a little more time and continued use. Works fine if close to each other but the one about 50' away through thin walls and open doors isn't working...will continue to move the transmitter around and see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Sound quality is excellent. Used to communicate with basement and external shop building.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in KS

customer_reviews.title: Failed to operate
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 units, one had a defective "3" keypad button. The units could not remember their assigned station number and could not call the correct other units consistently. Each unit had to be reset after use as to what its original station number was. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Christie B. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: A bit fragile, but a very easy warranty process
customer_reviews.text: I needed this device so that my caregivers can hear if I need them. It worked well for that, although it only allows one way communication. After one year, one of the units stopped working. I had already registered, so all I had to do was send them the receipt from Amazon and they mailed me a replacement with no questions asked. You have to be careful with the power cord because it will break if you trip over it. It also does not have a standard power cable despite what the description says.
customer_reviews.author: mhhilo

customer_reviews.title: I would return if I kept the package
customer_reviews.text: Build and sound quality are both poor. Mic basically needs to be a foot or so from the mouth, and the cases super light so they slip and slid with just the wait of the cord
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Desfosses

customer_reviews.title: answering isn't easy
customer_reviews.text: Pushing the page button alerts the other party who must access the system to respond. The same goes for pushing the talk button. They must go to the unit to respond. Finally, the quality of the sound isn't great- very difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Biggreenmachine

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Sound quality is good but you have to stand close to the item in order to be heard by the station. The Vox is a nice feature but again, The sensitivity can’t be changed so you find yourself standing pretty close in order for it to catch your voice and transmit. Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dabrub

customer_reviews.title: Intercom System
customer_reviews.text: So thankful we finally decided to get an Intercom System. This was easy to install, the sound quality is good, and is quite a step saver rather than running up and down the stairs. We've installed three units, and very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Guillochon

customer_reviews.title: Range
customer_reviews.text: We live in a large house and difficult to use the "holler" system to talk back and forth. Put the 3 intercoms-one on each end and one in the middle. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Help if we fall
customer_reviews.text: Good source to get help. my spouse and I are elderly and have a tendency to fall so we can call each other if this happens then 911 can be called. Like these have them in three different places .Could just be a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you know how to use it. If you scream into the monitor, it sounds terrible. If you stand about 2 feet away and speak normally, these sound great and work well throughout my 5k sq ft home on 3 levels
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Wissner

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't really complain much. It does what it's suppose to. The audio quality is pretty poor and the talk function is a bit temperamental. Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Cannot see control buttons on dimly lit rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Confusing to use. We need to push #1, no matter if on the basement, first or second floor. It would be good if "Talk" and other buttons were backlit as the numbers are.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Terrasi (Garrett) Hodgdon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and understand. Have to remember to hold the talk button down but it works. We tested it approximately 1/4 mile.
customer_reviews.author: RadDoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use . No issue so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So Far Easy yo install . And voice clear.
customer_reviews.author: felix

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: We used for family communication between first and second floors in our house. After 10 months, one of the unit’s power connection didn’t work. Hozmart replaced it under 1 year warranty immediately with follow up email, great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: byron sakanari

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this product in our home. We had moved down in the basement and we put these in our kids room to make they could alert us in the middle of the night if they needed anything. Works great for this use.
customer_reviews.author: Kaaren Schoof

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sound
customer_reviews.text: I like the product , but the sound isn't very loud. You have to be right by it to hear. That's not good if in another room.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Edgecomb

customer_reviews.title: Works for us.
customer_reviews.text: They work for what we need. One of them is a little less clear than the others. I think they are pretty good. For the money, I would recommend them to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fabulous purchase! When I’m working out in my shed the main house can still get ahold of me and I can get ahold of them.
customer_reviews.author: Regon Clement

customer_reviews.title: they have great range but horrible sound
customer_reviews.text: I have one upstairs, downstairs and one in the garage and they connect perfectly, however the volume of the speaker makes it so hard to hear them. even for someone who is pretty young with good hearing. i couldn't image them for someone who is older and hard of hearing...
customer_reviews.author: lookyhere

customer_reviews.title: nice produce
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to do but it is a little hard to hear. other than that a good buy
customer_reviews.author: bj newell

customer_reviews.title: false advertising.
customer_reviews.text: The product description is Wireless Intercom System, however the unit comes with a cord and adapter that must be plugged into an outlet for the intercom to function. If buyers want a wireless intercom, look elsewhere, this unit is not wireless.
customer_reviews.author: larryh

customer_reviews.title: They Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I'm happy and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A.

customer_reviews.title: No comment.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to communicate between my shop and the house and it works so well. No complaints, the Bell is loud but at least people can hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Devivery was quick, company seems concerned with your satisficaton.
customer_reviews.text: Use this item between my son's main house and my father-in-law house. The phone reception in our area and in the houses is terrible to none, this allows us to communicate between the houses. The range between houses in only 50 yards and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great system, works perfectly. Set up was easy and the sound is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Bierly

customer_reviews.title: Helps monitor mom and dad in home care
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely work long distances but has static. Will pick up baby monitors or other radios in the neighborhood
customer_reviews.author: mi55y

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great, easy to use. Just added three more so we have 6 in total.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for an office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office to assist with communication in a big clinic. It works great and eases the need to shout across the building. These units do have a tendency to get loose around the connection port in the back, however, I contacted the company about the issue and they sent me a new updated unit- no issues! Great overall!
customer_reviews.author: Anisah

customer_reviews.title: Stay in touch!
customer_reviews.text: The Hosmart units are a great value. I am getting good range and sound quality. Haven't had any problems.A quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D SNOW

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product but sometimes quality of sound is not as good as others
customer_reviews.author: Cjake

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hear clearly
customer_reviews.text: Did not work the way I thought it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Ciscokid422

customer_reviews.title: These do not work well at all
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for communication from office to office in one suite. They do not work well at all. Not easy to set up and very poor clarity. This shouldn't happen considering we are 30 feet away from one another. Tried to return the product because we don't use them but can't find the option to do so. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Donno how to use multiple channels, a little hard to hear what ppl are saying. If you speak slowly, it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: DKLJJKAD

customer_reviews.title: Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was terrible. Even with volume up, conversation was unintelligible. Quality is like a cheap kids walker talkie, but has worse microphones. Update: 6/11/19 Got an email from the company in China. They seem sincerely concerned about my review. I will respond to them truthfully.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Clear communication
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended We bought a set of three to use between the house, man cave and shop. Easy to use and clear voices.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great range!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our house, garage and one unit is in my sisters house next door and that works great too! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wilks

customer_reviews.title: great range
customer_reviews.text: I am using the at a church , front gate to office. work great
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: They serve the purpose
customer_reviews.text: They work ok but wish the talk button was bigger than the rest ,so my older mother could hit the right button
customer_reviews.author: DAVID E NYE

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to set up. We are able to talk throughout our house, even in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mongold

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for simple residential application
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are poor. I can’t get it to work. I’m replacing a Radio Shack Intercom System that was 20 years old. It was a great and simple system I assumed I was buying a similar easy to use system. I’m sure there are applications that this system would be applicable, but it sure was a bad purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed considering the reviews. Only worked sporadically and the unit itself felt SOOOOO cheap. Each unit probably weighs one ounce. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: KJM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the 3 places we needed to communicate
customer_reviews.author: Debra Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: ALL THATS NEEDED: PLUG IN AND MAKE SURE CHANNELS ARE SET.
customer_reviews.text: Luved everything about these intercoms.Searched for a while before I saw these wasnt sure but after looking at reviews had to try it.EASY TO SET UP JUST MAKE SURE CHANNELS ARE SET.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonnie G

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Great product. Works as stated. Amazing customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: greg shields

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It accomplished our goals of communicating from upstairs to down.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect system for monitoring and communicating throughout your home. Very easy setup. Had the system up and running in under 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Intercome
customer_reviews.text: Works great! These seem to be hard to find anymore. Exactly what I needed for a large house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to set up they are great for me with ...
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to set up they are great for me with my husband being sick and he can call me when I'm in another room they work really well
customer_reviews.author: Charie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased wish I could have ordered these long time ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased wish I could have ordered these long time ago live in a very large house my intercom system has made life a little easier planning on ordering another set. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: carolyn robinson

customer_reviews.title: This is just what we needed for my Dad. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed for my Dad. The call button is very loud which is helpful when you are hard of hearing!
customer_reviews.author: Pher

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, we use it to communicate between two metal building about 40-50 foot apart.
customer_reviews.author: Malena Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this system. What we needed for our two story house.
customer_reviews.author: Don and Martha

customer_reviews.title: Keeps us in contact
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. I live with an elderly family member with mobility issues, she can talk to me anytime with out the need for yelling. A real piece of mind from this.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far this works exactly as we need it to. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Call Button is OBNOXIOUSLY LOUD
customer_reviews.text: One of the 3 units was DOA and the call button on these devices ring obnoxiously loud and is not controllable by the VOL- VOL+ buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked ok
customer_reviews.text: there good but I wish the volume could go a little louder but I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: paul michaud

customer_reviews.title: Cheap..
customer_reviews.text: Unless your mouth is right on the speaker, you cannot hear the person talking. You cannot control the volume, the volume buttons just SCREAM at your when you push them. Its not effective.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Ease of setup and installation.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, was real easy to set up and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MO's

customer_reviews.title: annoying
customer_reviews.text: when calling another office the intercom would ring in the office I was calling from which was very annoying. item was returned
customer_reviews.author: Bottom Line Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good Range
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far. Only had 2 weeks so far. Sound quality could be better but overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My 100 year old mother moved in with us, so we use it like a baby monitor. She feels safe that all she needs to do is yell out and we will come to her aid.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly wireless
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would charge and then be able to be unplugged. They have to be plugged in to "charger" to work.
customer_reviews.author: amy lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are very good for the money I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Hosmart Wireless Intercom
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work...not in the wireless mode. Reached out to manufacturer several times, no response.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Works perfectly for calling my kids from upstairs without having to yell lol
customer_reviews.author: Shantel Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Intercom
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work as advertised I have one in a garage and one in the house. Distance of 100 feet away from each other and work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: In fact this machine that I've been looking for since a long time it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Use the system to maintain contact with bed-ridden spouse. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Bains

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 that have held up good for a year.
customer_reviews.author: jeff s

product_meta.title: Wireless Intercom System Hosmart 1/2 Mile LONG RANGE 7-Channel Security Wireless Intercom System for Home or Office (New Version) [3 stations Black][NOT WIRELESS CHARGER]
feature_bullets: The Hosmart Advantage: 30 + years of wireless intercom home system technology produced by our leading factory.Pass Safety Certification and Lifetime Quality Warranty: The wireless intercom system passed FCC, CE, ROSH Certified. In order to insure your benefit, we will give you a lifetime warranty.

Long Range and Multi-Channel: 2019 new release 1/2 mile long range (in ideal situations) 7 channel secure wireless intercom system. It integrates the latest technology to be the most trusted intercom system for home and office.

Individually Function and Easy Using: Powerful and Individually Function, Monitor, Talk, VOX(Voice Operated Exchange), Group call function. Monitor function can monitor 10 hours at once. Group function (conference call) can call all the stations in intercom system. VOX(Voice Operated Exchange)

Voice Crystal Clear and Secure Digital Communication: Duo to anti-interference signal technology and secret digital channel, the wireless intercom system works perfectly for you in any place., secure digital communication,Connect ability to our walkie talkies and wireless intercom doorbell system

Wide Using Range and Support by Power Bank: This wireless intercom system can use in a wide rang, home, office, outdoor etc. It can support by power bank(5V 1A) so you can take devices to any place you want. And it can work with other brand devices by the same digital channel code.
